xuiCheckboxGroup
directive in module xui

Description

XUI Checkbox group.

Usage

as element:
<xui-checkbox-group
       ng-model="{array}"
       [on-change]="{function}"
       [inverted]="{boolean}">
</xui-checkbox-group>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
ng-modelarray

The model that the value of the checkbox group is bound to.

[on-change]function

(item, checked)=>void Callback for value collection change.

[inverted]boolean

Whether inner checkboxes should display inverted values.

Example
